participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, Ethan loves trying new things and is always up for a good challenge.
participant_1.background: I enjoy playing tennis because it is a good workout and I can play with my friends. My sister is a guitarist. I once dressed up as a superhero and told the police officer that I was on my way to save the world. I always think people are looking at me. Coffee and books are my best friends.

participant_2.name: Ava
participant_2.personality: Ava is introspective and creative, often seeking solace in music and nature to recharge her spirit.
participant_2.background: I love to listen to pop music to cheer myself up when I'm feeling down. I love the outdoors. I want to conquer my anxiety so I can live my life to the fullest. I want to live somewhere where I can wear purple all the time and listen to Iron Maiden as loud as I want. I don't really care for social media, I'm more interested in getting to know the people in my new city.

content.text: Hi! I'm a huge fan of Iron Maiden!
Awesome! They're one of my favorite bands too!
What's your favorite song by them?
That's a hard one, but I'd have to say "The Trooper".
That's a great song! I love the guitar solo in it.
What's your favorite thing to do outdoors?
I love hiking and camping. I also love going to the beach.
Me too! I love being in nature.
I'm glad to hear that! I'm always looking for new people to go hiking and camping with.
I'd love to go hiking with you sometime!
That would be great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
Sounds good! I'm looking forward to it.
